task.title: Copy Record
task.shortdesc: Copy all visible Record Data information to the clipboard.

step.cmd: Display the record you wish to copy and choose the Session Copy record menu item (Shift+CMD+C).
step.stepresult: All visible tiers will be copied to the clipboard, with tier names and tier data separated by tabs. It can be pasted into the Session Editor as a new record, or into another window.When pasted into a word processor, you will likely be able to automatically convert the copied record into a table. Ensure that you use tabs to separate cells.
